steps.name: Complete an online application (12/7/22-2/28/23)
steps.description: before the application deadline and submit it to the Regional School Choice office.

steps.name: Results will be emailed to families
steps.description: by the Regional School Choice Office

steps.name: If selected, you will have a window in which to accept the placement.
steps.description: Following acceptance, a shadow day can be arranged by calling (860) 695-9095. If not selected, you will be notified of your position on the waiting list by RSCO.

steps.name: Complete registration
steps.description: Registration paperwork for the school must be received at UHSSE by deadline. Once you have receive a seat at UHSSE you will be sent a link to register online.

incomingStudentInstructions.description: Incoming freshmen will participate in math placement testing. Please complete the google form:

openHouses.description: Open Houses for the 2023-24 School Year   - Coming Soon
